title: Manganese-based nanozyme enabled efficient mitigation of Huanglongbing-induced oxidative damage in Citrus
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00519H, Paper
Shuojun Li, Yuying Long, Guiyun Deng, Yinghui Men, Feifan Lu, Zihan Wang, Jiaying Li, Heyou Han
Manganese oxide nanozymes (MONPs) facilitate the alleviation of Huanglongbing (HLB) symptoms in Citrus by mitigating oxidative stress.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
